thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Great customer service. I hit a pothole
and blew out my front tire. I made my appointment and was told I should replace all of my tires due to the AWD feature of my car. When I got to town fair the gentleman who helped me out told me that wouldn't be necessary but he did point out a bubble in my back tire that I did not see before. Most salesman would have pushed 4 tires on you at that point but he told me that wouldn't be necessary. Great experience, I would certainly recommend town fair just because of the great service I got.
